mapper.sql: COLLECT_ID, COLLECTOR_CODE, AMNAME, GT_COLLECT_ID, RL, TYPE, JD, WD, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE
mapper.select: SELECT line.CITY, line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID, bdz.AMNAME AS BDZAMNAME, line.COLLECT_ID AS XL_COLLECT_ID, line.AMNAME AS XLAMNAME, byq.COLLECT_ID, byq.AMNAME, byq.RL, byq.TYPE, byq.JD, byq.WD FROM t_cj_byq byq INNER JOIN (SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, FROM_ID AS id, FROM_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (FROM_TYPE = 9) UNION SELECT XL_COLLECT_ID AS XLINTERID, TO_ID AS id, TO_TYPE AS TYPE FROM t_cj_xld WHERE (TO_TYPE = 9)) xld ON byq.COLLECT_ID = xld.id INNER JOIN t_cj_line line ON xld.XLINTERID = line.COLLECT_ID INNER JOIN t_cj_bdz bdz ON line.BDZ_COLLECT_ID = bdz.COLLECT_ID where byq.COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_cj_byq (COLLECT_ID, COLLECTOR_CODE, AMNAME, GT_COLLECT_ID, RL, TYPE, JD, WD, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, SYNC_STATE) values (#{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gtCollectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update t_cj_byq
COLLECTOR_CODE = #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMNAME = #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GT_COLLECT_ID = #{gtCollectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RL = #{rl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JD = #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WD = #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_cj_byq set COLLECTOR_CODE = #{collectorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMNAME = #{amname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GT_COLLECT_ID = #{gtCollectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RL = #{rl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JD = #{jd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WD = #{wd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, SYNC_STATE = #{syncState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where COLLECT_ID = #{collectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
